snippet.title: Super Blue Boy Planet Steam Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the game here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/560260/
Developer info: http://www.nannings.nz

Defeat the aliens to save your princess! In Super Blue Boy Planet, you must traverse dangerous lands filled with green foes. You can jump and glide to cross spike pits safely. Hop on aliens to make them disappear, and don't fall into the abyss!
